archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0842
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Disclosure Manager/Analyst, I want to be able to extract (in excel format) Subscriber Identifiers (including Name/Address/DOB/MSISDN/SIM/IMEI/Login) for all services/datasets, by way of any identifier given by NZ Law Enforcement Agencies under statutory orders served, to ensure that we are able to provide evidential records which assist in either proving the criminal offending or innocence of customers who are using our services.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
